DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter double blind randomize control trial compare `` atropine+propofol '' v `` atropine+atracurium+sufentanil '' premedication prior endotracheal intubation neonate . Primary outcome : pulse oxymetry value < 80 % 60 second . Secondary outcome : number attempt , duration procedure , change physiologic parameter , short- long-term neurodevelopmental outcome . Hypothesis : `` atropine + propofol '' compare `` atropine+atracurium+sufentanil '' significantly reduce frequency severe hypoxemia .
DOC.criteria: Corrected age < 45 week gestational age Currently hospitalize neonatal intensive care unit Requiring semiurgent elective intubation Equipped reliable permeable IV line Parental consent Lack parental consent Parental refusal Sedative anesthetic treatment previous 24 hour Hemodynamic compromise define mean blood pressure < correct GA and/or refill time > 3 second Upper airway malformation Lifethreatening situation require immediate intubation Inclusion another trial permit participation Impossibility establish venous access Any contraindication experimental drug
